title: Ep. 508 - Sick But Not Tired Of Winning
description:
Democrats in six states head to the primaries today, and polling shows Biden might blow Bernie out of the water within a matter of hours. We will examine the latest data on Joe’s chances in November. Then, pundits on all sides attack the President for his response to the Flu Manchu outbreak. But a very important group than the chattering class thinks President Trump is doing just fine. Finally, a woman asks Slate if she should tell her husband to stop sleeping with his girlfriend to stop coronavirus from spreading to her mother. We will break down this woman’s problems, both biological and cultural.

Check out The Cold War: What We Saw, a new podcast written and presented by Bill Whittle at https://www.dailywire.com/coldwar. In Part 1 we peel back the layers of mystery cloaking the Terror state run by the Kremlin, and watch as America takes its first small steps onto the stage of world leadership.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
